name: Master Smith Vulcan Deepforge
prompt: Panoramic view of Master Smith Vulcan Deepforge, realm-appropriate materials like bioluminescent coral or cloudstone, weather cues like currents, storms, or drifting pollen, golden hour, night glow, or storm-lit ambience, small figures, creatures, or vehicles for life and scale, cinematic environmental concept art, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Cinematic view of Master Smith Vulcan Deepforge showing architecture, atmosphere, and inhabitants.
